title: CITRIS Core Seeding Funding Proposal Deadline Extended
description: The CITRIS Core Seed Funding Program invites Principal Investigators across UC Berkeley, UC Davis, UC Davis Health, UC Merced, and UC Santa Cruz to apply for seed funding that advances CITRIS and the Banatao Institute's research thrusts, strengthens UC campus connections, and drives novel technology applications. CITRIS is offering $40,000-$60,000 per 12-month project through six proposal categories for impact through innovation.
